item.description:
Pipes in the Valley Celtic Festival

This festival was fun last year and will be fun again Lots of music and dancing
http://www.riverfront....

Saturday, September 27, 11am-10pm

This event is part of the International Festival Series presented by Lincoln Financial Foundation. This Celtic Music Festival celebrates eight years at the Riverfront with bagpipes, Celtic Fiddling, Scottish Drumming, Highland Games, Step Dancing and Kids Activities! Sponsored by The Olde Burnside Brewing Co., this yearâ€™s event promises a day filled with fun, flavor and world-class entertainment! CHEERS!

For the complete event information visit: pipesinthevalley.com

Location: Mortensen Riverfront Plaza - FDowntown Hartford

Event Schedule: Coming Soon.

PARK RULES & REGULATIONS - Please note: Due to liability and legal restrictions, NO OUTSIDE ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES of any kind may be brought into the Riverfront Parks by any party. Riverfront Recapture is the only licensed authority to sell and serve liquor for consumption in the Riverfront Parks

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: PIPES IN THE VALLEY
